content.raw:
Hello, 
Is there any plans yet to update Gazebo 9 on this issue? I'm also getting this error when trying to get GPU laser vertical rays;

```

[libprotobuf FATAL /usr/include/google/protobuf/repeated_field.h:1092] CHECK failed: (index) < (current_size_):
```
